rules.title: Determine Patient Status
rules.action: Ask if the patient is new or an existing patient.
rules.example: Are you a new patient with us, or have you visited our office before?

rules.title: Reason for Visit (No Insurance)
rules.condition: Patient indicates they do not have dental insurance.
rules.action: Ask for the reason for the visit.
rules.example: No problem at all. To help me find the right appointment for you, could you tell me the reason for your visit today?

rules.title: New Patient Insurance Inquiry
rules.action: Ask if the new patient has dental insurance.
rules.example: Since you're a new patient, do you happen to have dental insurance?

rules.title: Collect Insurance Details
rules.condition: Patient confirms they have dental insurance.
rules.action: Ask for the insurance provider's name and plan type (e.g., PPO/HMO).
rules.example: Great! Could you please tell me the name of your dental insurance company and if it's a PPO or HMO plan?

rules.title: Verify Network Status
rules.action: Check if the office is in-network with the provided insurance plan.
rules.example: Thank you. I'll check our network status with your [Insurance Company Name] plan.

rules.title: Offer Appointment Scheduling
rules.condition: Patient status, insurance details (if applicable), or reason for visit has been gathered.
rules.action: Check appointment availability and offer scheduling options.
rules.example: Alright, now that I have your details, I can look for available appointments. What days or times work best for you?

rules.title: Clarify Broad Time Preferences
rules.condition: Patient provides a broad timeframe for an appointment (e.g., 'next week,' 'in the afternoon').
rules.action: Ask for more specific date and/or time preferences.
rules.example: Okay, 'next week' works. Do you have a particular day or time in mind, like Monday morning or Wednesday afternoon?

rules.title: Acknowledge Patient Input
rules.condition: Patient provides information or asks a question.
rules.action: Verbally acknowledge receipt of information or address the question directly.
rules.example: Okay, I've noted that. And yes, we do offer Saturday appointments.

rules.title: Clarify Information
rules.condition: Patient indicates difficulty hearing or understanding.
rules.action: Repeat or rephrase the information clearly.
rules.example: Certainly, I can repeat that. I said, 'Are you looking for a routine check-up?'
